properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 13 at 8:39PM CST until January 16 at 11:00AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Buttahatchie River...Tombigbee
River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Tombigbee River near Amory
* until Thursday January 16.
* At 8 PM Monday the stage was 20.8 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 23.1 feet on Wednesday January 15.
* Flood stage is 20.0 feet.
* The river rose above flood stage Saturday January 11 and will
continue rising to near 23.1 feet by Wednesday January 15. The
river will fall below flood stage Thursday January 16.
* At 23.0 feet...Most lowland and farm land near the river is
flooded. Equipment and livestock may need to be moved to higher
ground.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued when conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
